entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING ENDED, Canora

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly sunny. High minus 24.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud this morning. Clearing this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 24. Wind chill minus 39 this morning and minus 29 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: A few clouds. Low minus 32 with temperature rising to minus 20 by morning.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness overnight. Wind becoming south 30 km/h gusting to 50 this evening. Low minus 32 with temperature rising to minus 20 by morning. Wind chill minus 48 this evening. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Snow. High minus 16.
entry.summary: Snow ending in the afternoon then cloudy. Blowing snow at times in the morning. Amount possibly more than 10 cm. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light near noon. High minus 16. Wind chill minus 33 in the morning and minus 22 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Saturday 24 December 2022
